companies.name: Atchinson, Tokepa and Santa Fe Railway

privates.name: Waterloo & Saugeen Railway Co.
privates.description: The public company that owns this private company may place a free station marker and green #59 tile on the Kitchener hex (I12). This action closes the private company.

privates.name: The Canada Company
privates.description: During its operating turn, the public company owning this private company may place a track tile in the hex occupied by this private company (H11). This track lay is in addition to the public company's normal track lay. This action does not close the private company.

privates.name: Great Lakes Shipping Company
privates.description: At any time during its operating turn, the owning public company may place the port token in any one city adjacent to Lake Erie, Lake Huron or Georgian Bay. Placement of this token closes the Great Lakes Shipping Company.

privates.name: Niagara Falls Suspension Bridge Company
privates.description: The public company that owns this private company may add a $10 bonus when running to Buffalo (P17/P19). Other public companies may purchase the right for $50.

privates.name: St. Clair Frontier Tunnel Company
privates.description: The public company that owns this private company may add a $10 Port Huron bonus when running to Sarnia (B13). Other public companies may purchase the right for $50.

phases.notes: The CGR is started. D Trains may be purchased. +20 Port token removed. Small cities may be upgraded / downgraded.

notes.note: Shares in the market pay dividends to the corporation
Corporations float when 50% is owned by players or the open market - trade-in shares do not count.
Major corporations receive mail contract equal to value of home city when starting an operating round with a train.
Certificate limit +1 if no corporation merges into NdM at the start of phase 5.
No more than 50% of a corporation's shares may be in the market at any time
Shares cannot be sold during the first stock round

legend.description: Companies float at 40%. Class III only.
Companies float at 50%. Class II/III only.
Acquisition: Corporation assets will be auctioned if entering SR
